main event: A witness observed a large, bell-shaped object hovering in El Paso, Texas on November 4, 1957.
interesting points: The object emitted a whirring sound similar to a small car engine., The object was approximately 75 feet off the ground., The witness described the object as larger than a car., The object changed altitude erratically and eventually disappeared over the Franklin Mountains., The sighting lasted between 30-60 seconds.
witness description: The witness was a 35-year-old border inspector from Texas.
